response:
Sophia’s car uses 4 gal to travel 100 mi, so its fuel economy is  

\[
\text{MPG} = \frac{100\text{ mi}}{4\text{ gal}} = 25\text{ mi/gal}.
\]

With a full 12‑gal tank, the maximum distance is  

\[
25\text{ mi/gal} \times 12\text{ gal} = 300\text{ mi}.
\]

Thus, Sophia can drive **300 miles** on one full tank.  

#### 300
